robot

Class NxtCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.NxtCommand

  • public class NxtCommand
extends Object
    This class implements a connection to the NXT application

    The class allows sending commands to the NXT in order to control the motors and sensors. The NXT application must be running before initializing the class.

    See Also:
    NxtApplication, NxtOperation

      • sendCommand

        public static byte[] sendCommand(byte operationType,
                 int port,
                 byte operationId,
                 int argument,
                 int expectedReturnSize)
        Send command to the NXT
        Parameters:
        operationType - The operation type
        port - Port of the motor or sensor if relevant
        operationId - The operation ID
        argument - Argument for the requested operation
        expectedReturnSize - The expected return size of the operation (bytes)
        Returns:
        Response from the NXT if supported by the command
